actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that September 4, 1982, the one hundredth anniversary of Thomas Edison's Pearl Street control power station, should be commemorated as "Pearl Street Centennial Day".

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that September 4, 1982, the 100th anniversary of Thomas Edison's Pearl Street central power station, should be commemorated as Pearl Street Centennial Day.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that September 4, 1982, the one hundredth anniversary of Thomas Edison's Pearl Street control power station, should be commemorated as "Pearl Street Centennial Day".
